title: In This Life, The Greatest Star In The Universe - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Celebrities   Dancers   Famous Parents   Famous Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Music   Showbiz   Singers   Special Abilities   Teamwork
author: Son Yoon   손윤
description:
A face is a face, a song is a song, a composition is a composition. 
Beautiful, talented and hardworking upcoming idol Sun Woojoo. 
One day, a miracle came to him!

'I'll become a star who shines more than anyone else.'

His dreadful dancing wasn't an issue anymore.
At last, an idol with everything prepared. 
Now, a monster rookie has appeared in the entertainment world!

In this life, the greatest star in the universe!>
